recipes.name: Pasta Aglio e Olio
recipes.description: Simple Italian pasta with garlic, olive oil, and chili flakes. Minimalist perfection.

steps.instruction: Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
While pasta cooks, slice garlic thinly.
Heat olive oil over medium-low. Add garlic and cook until golden (not brown).
Add chili flakes and remove from heat.
Drain pasta and add to the pan. Toss with reserved pasta water.
Add parsley and parmesan. Toss and serve immediately.

tips: Pasta water helps emulsify the sauce

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil. Simple and perfect.

steps.instruction: Mix flour, water, yeast, and salt. Knead for 10 minutes until smooth.
Let dough rise for 1-2 hours until doubled.
Crush tomatoes with salt for sauce.
Preheat oven to highest setting (250°C+) with pizza stone if available.
Stretch dough, add sauce and torn mozzarella.
Bake until crust is charred and cheese melted. Add basil and drizzle oil.

recipes.name: Chicken Tacos
recipes.description: Mexican street-style tacos with seasoned chicken and fresh toppings.

steps.instruction: Season chicken with cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, and salt.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through. Rest and slice or shred.
Dice onion and chop cilantro. Cut limes into wedges.
Warm tortillas on a dry pan or directly over flame.
Fill tortillas with chicken, onion, and cilantro.
Serve with salsa verde and lime wedges.

tips: Char tortillas slightly for authentic taste

recipes.name: Hummus
recipes.description: Creamy Middle Eastern chickpea dip. Perfect with pita bread.

steps.instruction: If using dried chickpeas, soak overnight and cook until very soft.
Blend tahini and lemon juice for 1 minute until light and creamy.
Add garlic, cumin, and salt. Blend for 30 seconds.
Add chickpeas and blend for 2 minutes until very smooth.
With blender running, add ice water until desired consistency.
Serve drizzled with olive oil and paprika.

tips: Very soft chickpeas are key to smooth hummus

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with tomatoes, cucumber, feta, and olives.

steps.instruction: Cut tomatoes into wedges. Slice cucumber into half moons.
Thinly slice red onion. Cut pepper into rings.
Combine vegetables in a bowl.
Add olives and place feta block on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar.
Sprinkle oregano and salt. Serve immediately.

tips: Don't crumble the feta - slice it

recipes.name: Falafel
recipes.description: Crispy Middle Eastern chickpea fritters. Vegetarian street food classic.

steps.instruction: Soak dried chickpeas overnight. Drain well.
Pulse chickpeas in food processor until coarse (not smooth).
Add herbs, onion, garlic, and spices. Process until combined.
Add baking powder. Refrigerate mixture for 1 hour.
Form into small patties or balls.
Deep fry until deep golden brown. Drain on paper.

recipes.name: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce. Middle Eastern breakfast favorite.

steps.instruction: Dice onion and bell pepper. Mince garlic.
Heat oil. Sauté onion and pepper until soft.
Add garlic and spices. Cook 1 minute.
Add crushed tomatoes. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Make wells and crack eggs into them. Cover and cook until whites are set.
Crumble feta on top. Garnish with parsley.

tips: Don't overcook eggs - yolks should be runny
Use a cast iron pan for best results

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy Italian rice dish with earthy mushrooms. Comfort food perfection.

steps.instruction: Keep stock warm on low heat. Sauté mushrooms in butter until golden.
In a separate pan, sauté onion in olive oil until soft. Add garlic.
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes until edges are translucent.
Add wine and stir until absorbed.
Add stock one ladle at a time, stirring constantly, waiting for absorption.
Fold in mushrooms, parmesan, butter, and thyme. Season and rest 2 minutes.

recipes.name: Chicken Quesadilla
recipes.description: Crispy Mexican tortilla filled with chicken, cheese, and peppers.

steps.instruction: Sauté peppers and onions until soft. Season with cumin.
Shred chicken and mix with sautéed vegetables.
Place tortilla in pan. Add cheese, chicken mixture, more cheese.
Fold tortilla in half.
Cook on medium heat until golden. Flip and cook other side.
Cut into triangles. Serve with sour cream and salsa.

tips: Cheese on both sides helps it stick

recipes.name: Guacamole
recipes.description: Fresh Mexican avocado dip with lime and cilantro. Party essential.

steps.instruction: Halve avocados and remove pit. Scoop into bowl.
Add lime juice and salt. Mash to desired consistency.
Finely dice onion, tomato, and jalapeño.
Mince garlic and chop cilantro.
Fold all ingredients into avocado.
Taste and adjust seasoning. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Roman pasta with eggs, cheese, and pancetta. Creamy without cream.

steps.instruction: Cook pasta in well-salted water until al dente.
While pasta cooks, crisp pancetta in a pan without oil.
Whisk eggs with pecorino and plenty of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup pasta water. Drain pasta.
Remove pan from heat. Add pasta to pancetta.
Add egg mixture off heat. Toss quickly, adding pasta water for creaminess.

tips: Never add eggs to hot pan on heat
Pasta water is key to creaminess

recipes.name: Burrito Bowl
recipes.description: Deconstructed burrito with all the toppings. Customizable and satisfying.

steps.instruction: Cook rice. Season with lime juice and cilantro.
Season protein with cumin and chili. Grill or pan-fry.
Heat beans with a little liquid and cumin.
Char corn in a dry pan.
Chop lettuce and tomatoes.
Assemble bowls: rice, protein, beans, corn, vegetables, cheese, sour cream, salsa.

tips: Make components ahead for meal prep

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Classic salad with romaine, parmesan, croutons, and creamy dressing.

steps.instruction: Cut bread into cubes. Toss with olive oil and garlic. Toast until golden.
Whisk mayo, lemon juice, garlic, mustard, Worcestershire, and olive oil.
Add grated parmesan to dressing.
Wash and tear romaine into pieces.
Toss lettuce with dressing.
Top with croutons and parmesan shavings.

recipes.name: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: Rich caramelized onion soup topped with crusty bread and melted Gruyère.

steps.instruction: Slice onions thinly. Melt butter in a large pot.
Add onions and cook slowly for 45-60 minutes until deeply caramelized.
Add wine and scrape up brown bits. Cook until evaporated.
Add stock, thyme, and bay leaf. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Toast bread slices. Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls.
Top with bread and cheese. Broil until bubbly and golden.

tips: Low and slow caramelization is key

recipes.name: Lasagna
recipes.description: Layered Italian pasta with meat sauce, béchamel, and cheese. The ultimate comfort food.

steps.instruction: Make meat sauce: brown beef, add onion, garlic, tomatoes, herbs. Simmer 30 min.
Make béchamel: melt butter, add flour, whisk in milk until thick.
Cook lasagna sheets if not using no-boil type.
Layer: meat sauce, pasta, béchamel, cheeses. Repeat 3-4 times.
Top with béchamel and cheese.
Bake at 180°C for 45 minutes until golden. Rest 15 minutes before serving.

tips: Can be made ahead and frozen

recipes.name: Fluffy American Pancakes
recipes.description: Light, fluffy buttermilk pancakes. Classic American breakfast stack.

steps.instruction: Mix dry ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, soda, salt.
Whisk wet ingredients: buttermilk, eggs, melted butter, vanilla.
Pour wet into dry. Mix until just combined (lumps are okay).
Heat griddle to medium. Grease lightly.
Pour 1/4 cup batter. Cook until bubbles form, flip.
Cook until golden. Serve with maple syrup and butter.

recipes.name: French Toast
recipes.description: Crispy outside, custardy inside bread slices. Classic brunch favorite.

steps.instruction: Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, sugar, and salt.
Pour mixture into shallow dish.
Heat butter in pan over medium heat.
Dip bread slices, coating both sides. Let excess drip.
Cook until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
Serve with powdered sugar, maple syrup, or fresh fruit.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Creamy avocado on toasted sourdough. Modern healthy breakfast favorite.

steps.instruction: Toast sourdough slices until golden and crispy.
Halve avocados, remove pit, scoop flesh.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado thickly on toast.
Top with halved tomatoes, chili flakes.
Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle salt flakes.

recipes.name: Huevos Rancheros
recipes.description: Fried eggs on tortillas with spicy tomato salsa. Mexican breakfast classic.

steps.instruction: Roast tomatoes, onion, jalapeno, garlic until charred.
Blend roasted vegetables into salsa. Season with cumin and salt.
Warm black beans with a little salsa.
Fry tortillas briefly until slightly crispy.
Fry eggs sunny-side up.
Layer: tortilla, beans, salsa, egg. Garnish with coriander.

recipes.name: French Crepes
recipes.description: Thin, delicate French pancakes. Sweet or savory, endlessly versatile.

steps.instruction: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Rest batter 30 minutes.
Heat non-stick pan over medium heat. Brush with butter.
Pour 1/4 cup batter, swirl to coat pan thinly.
Cook until edges lift and bottom is lightly golden.
Flip carefully. Cook 30 seconds more.
Fill with Nutella, fruit, or savory fillings.

recipes.name: Granola Parfait
recipes.description: Layered yogurt, granola, and fresh berries. Healthy and beautiful breakfast.

steps.instruction: Choose clear glasses or jars for layering.
Add first layer of Greek yogurt.
Add layer of granola.
Add layer of fresh berries.
Repeat layers. Top with berries and almonds.
Drizzle honey. Serve immediately for crunch.

recipes.name: Acai Bowl
recipes.description: Frozen acai berry smoothie bowl with fresh toppings. Superfood breakfast.

steps.instruction: Blend frozen acai, frozen banana, and almond milk until thick.
Pour into bowls. Consistency should be like soft-serve.
Add granola on one section.
Arrange sliced banana and berries.
Sprinkle coconut flakes.
Drizzle honey. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Masala Omelette Toast
recipes.description: Indian-spiced omelette on buttered toast. Fusion breakfast favorite.

steps.instruction: Beat eggs with salt, turmeric, chili powder.
Add chopped onion, tomato, chilies, coriander.
Heat butter in pan. Pour egg mixture.
Cook on medium until set. Fold in half.
Toast bread slices with butter.
Place omelette on toast. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Banana Oatmeal
recipes.description: Creamy oats with caramelized banana and honey. Warm healthy breakfast.

steps.instruction: Bring milk to simmer. Add oats and salt.
Cook oats stirring occasionally until creamy.
Meanwhile, slice 1 banana and mash the other.
Caramelize sliced banana in butter with honey.
Stir mashed banana and cinnamon into oats.
Top with caramelized banana and walnuts.
